activities: In the course of providing relocation management services, Dwellworks acts as a data processor and processes data in accordance with instructions of its clients.  In its role as data processor, Dwellworks collects personally identifiable data about transferees, assignees, and their families directly and from its clients.  The information is used to provide relocation support services pursuant to our contracts with our clients and as requested by customers.
privacyprograms: Dwellworks has instituted a self-regulatory program for ensuring verification and adherence to the Safe Harbor principles.  This program consists of regular information security reviews, including privacy information reviews, physical security reviews, diaster recovery planning, testing and reviews, and general audits.
recoursemech: Dwellworks commits to cooperate with the EU Data Protection Authorities (DPAs).
